title: Elon Musk Takes On Apple’s Power, Setting Up a Clash
description: In a series of tweets on Monday, Mr. Musk accused Apple of threatening to pull Twitter from its App Store and of trying to censor.

title: The Latest on the FTX Crisis
description: The collapse of FTX, one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency companies, is still sending shock waves through the crypto world.

title: U.S. Crypto Exchange Kraken Settles With Treasury Dept.
description: The crypto exchange, which had been under investigation for violating U.S. sanctions, agreed to pay $360,000 to settle the allegations.

title: Sympathy, and Job Offers, for Twitter’s Misinformation Experts
description: Seeing false and toxic information as a potentially expensive liability, companies in and outside the tech industry are angling to hire people who can keep it in check.

title: BlockFi Files for Bankruptcy as FTX Fallout Spreads
description: BlockFi was financially entangled with FTX, and its stability was thrust into uncertainty after FTX collapsed.

title: Meta Fined $275 Million for Breaking E.U. Data Privacy Law
description: The penalty, imposed by Irish data regulators, brings European fines against Facebook’s parent company to more than $900 million since last year.
